subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer will face Novak Djokovic for a spot in the final, which has been pushed back to Monday. Whoever advances will have had an extra day’s rest over his opponent.
snippet: Roger Federer will face Novak Djokovic for a spot in the final, which has been pushed back to Monday. Whoever advances will have had an extra day’s rest over his opponent.
